name: Hologram Dragon 3D Simulator
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Hologram.
Hologram Dragon 3D Simulator
Hologram Dragon simulator - a simulation game where you can play on your phone like a 3D hologram Dragon . The game uses the camera for a more realistic effect!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
Thank you for playing our games! Leave us feedback and we try to make our games even better for you!
